mapper.sql: orr.organ_rule_id as orr_organ_rule_id, orr.sup_organ_type_id as orr_sup_organ_type_id, orr.sub_organ_type_id as orr_sub_organ_type_id, orr.is_system as orr_is_system, orr.remark as orr_remark, orr.add_time as orr_add_time, orr.modify_time as orr_modify_time, orr.add_operator_id as orr_add_operator_id, orr.add_operator_name as orr_add_operator_name, orr.modify_operator_id as orr_modify_operator_id, orr.modify_operator_name as orr_modify_operator_name
mapper.select: SELECT , sup.organ_type_code AS sup_organ_type_code, sup.organ_type_name AS sup_organ_type_name, sub.organ_type_code AS sub_organ_type_code, sub.organ_type_name AS sub_organ_type_name FROM aa_organ_rule orr LEFT JOIN aa_organ_type sup ON orr.sup_organ_type_id = sup.organ_type_id LEFT JOIN aa_organ_type sub ON orr.sub_organ_type_id = sub.organ_type_id ORDER BY orr.add_time

SELECT , sup.organ_type_name AS sup_organ_type_name, sub.organ_type_name AS sub_organ_type_name FROM aa_organ_rule orr LEFT JOIN aa_organ_type sup ON orr.sup_organ_type_id = sup.organ_type_id LEFT JOIN aa_organ_type sub ON orr.sub_organ_type_id = sub.organ_type_id WHERE orr.organ_rule_id = #{organRuleId} ORDER BY orr.add_time
